title: ConvertUTF16toUTF8 (Function)
text:
FUNCTION ConvertUTF16toUTF8 : UDINT
This function converts an UTF-16 string to an UTF-8 string (may be wrong for 3 or 4 character encoded UTF8 characters).

rows.Name: sourceStart
rows.Comment: Pointer to the UTF-16 string to convert

rows:
Pointer to the UTF-8 string the converted string shall be
stored to

The size (in bytes) of the buffer (targetStart) the result
shall be stored in
Do not continue on illegal characters
